ftbquests.chapter.portable.title: Portable[--便携式--]
ftbquests.chapter.portable.quests0.descr: &bDanks&r, from the mod &eDank Storage&r, can &6automatically pick up items&r, can &6store items at >64 items per stack&r, and allow for you to &6use stored items&r, including blocks and food!. Higher tiers have more slots, and can store more per slot.[--来自mod&eDank存储&r的&bDanks&r可以&6自动拾取物品&r,可以&6将物品存储在每组>64个物品&r上,并允许你&6使用存储物品&r,包括方块和食物!更高的等级具有更多的插槽,每个插槽可以存储更多的物品.--]
Danks have two modes: &6Bag&r and &6Construction&r. There is a keybind to move between them (default is i).[--Danks有两种模式:&6Bag&r和&6建造&r.有按键绑定在它们之间移动(默认为i)。--]
In &6Bag&r mode, it works like a backpack. Tap control on a slot to lock it, so it doesn't get replaced when emptied.[--在&6背包&r模式下,它像背包一样工作。对插槽进行控制以锁定它,所以它不会在空的时候被替换.--]
There are 4 item pickup settings you can click through.[--有4个物品拾取设置可以单击.--]

In &6Construction&r mode, right-clicking the Dank &n&6acts like the item it is holding&r, as far as right-clicking goes. It can place blocks, right-click tools, throw Ender Pearls, etc. It doesn't work on items that have an animation, however.. &6Set the item by scrolling while sneaking&r.[--在&6建造&r模式下,右键单击Dank&n&6就像它拿着的物品一样&r,直到右键单击。它可以放置方块、右键单击工具、投掷末影珍珠等等。但是,它对于有动画的物品不起作用。&6潜行时滚轮来设置物品&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.portable.quests1.descr: &bBackpacks&r from &eSophisticated Backpacks&r can be &6placed in the world&r, and can be &6opened while worn&r.[--来自&e精致背包&r的&b背包&r可以&6放置在世界上&r,并且可以&6穿戴时打开&r.--]
Backpacks can also be &6upgraded&r to perform extra functions![--背包也可以&6升级&r来执行额外的功能!--]
ftbquests.chapter.portable.quests2.descr: Backpacks can be &bupgraded into several tiers&r.[--背包可以&b升级为几个等级&r.--]
High tier backpacks have more &6storage space&r, and room for &6more upgrades&r.[--高级背包具有更多的&6存储空间&r,还有&6更多升级&r的空间.--]
ftbquests.chapter.portable.quests3.descr: &bBackpack Upgrades&r can be installed onto Backpacks to make them perform certain functions.[--&b背包升级&r可以安装在背包上,使它们执行某些功能.--]
The tooltip of each Upgrade says what it does.[--每次升级的工具提示都说明它的作用。--]
ftbquests.chapter.portable.quests4.subti: It's Bigger on the Inside![--它的内部更大!--]
ftbquests.chapter.portable.quests4.descr: The &bPocket Dimension Backpack&r is a technological marvel. It creates a portable hole into another dimension to store your things.[--&b口袋维度背包&r是一个科技奇点。它将一个便携洞创建到另一个维度中来存储你的东西.--]
In essence, it's a &6double chest you can wear&r on your back. Access it with &6control+e&r.[--基本上,它是一个&6可以穿戴的双层箱子&r.用&6control+e&r来访问它.--]
